content: of the row 29 stitches have 5 stitches left of your row make a right-leaning decrease knit 3 stitches you will now shape the top of your hat 34 stitches by using the short row technique - you will be working back and forth over how to make your crazy little cardigan 99 your stitches your stitch count given with the wrong side facing you re-join from now on will include all stitches your yarn to the stitches being held on that are on hold for the short row your left-hand needle 51 stitches technique and any yarn overs 30 purl 14 stitches turn your work ready 17 purl 25 stitches turn your work to work back over these stitches 18 make a yarn over knit 25 stitches don t worry about the rest of your 30 stitches stitches for now you will come back to them later 37 stitches 19 purl 20 stitches turn your work 31 increase row knit into the front and 20 make a yarn over knit 20 stitches back of your first stitch knit until you 31 stitches have 1 stitch left of the row knit into the
